## Data Usage Notebook {#welcome}

Welcome to the [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center: Data Usage Notebook](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter), your gateway to exploring and analyzing curated datasets on greenhouse gas emissions.
Our cloud-based system offers seamless access to Greenhouse Gas curated datasets. Dive into the data with our data usage Jupyter notebooks, designed for efficient exploration, visualization, and analysis.
Whether you are focused on specific focus areas or product types, our dataset usage notebooks provide invaluable insights to drive informed decision-making.

Join us in our mission to make data-driven environmental solutions.
Explore, analyze, and make a difference with the U.S. GHG Center.
